laboratory_examinations.findings: Profiles revealed elevated markers of 17-hydroxylase deficiency, such as pregnanedriol and corticosterone metabolites. Also showed signs of 21-hydroxylase deficiency with elevated pregnanetriol and pregnanetriolone.
Basal plasma DHEA and androstenedione concentrations were low and unresponsive to ACTH; basal and post-ACTH 17OHP were elevated.
Testosterone response was subnormal; cortisol response was poor.
